scripts.installAll: yarn run installServer && yarn run installClient
scripts.installServer: yarn run installShared && cd server && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.installClient: yarn run installShared && cd client && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.buildDeployServer: cd server && yarn run tsc && cd ..
scripts.buildDeployClient: cd client && yarn run buildDeploy && cd ..
scripts.buildDeploy: yarn run buildDeployServer && yarn run buildDeployClient
